name: Rolly Coin
description:
Unity 2d made game - Rolly Coin. Scroller/Platformer Game.

Roll and jump around as the cryptocurrency Omnicoin through 4 levels, avoiding annoying birds, bats and even meteors.

5/5 energy bar per level, get hit 5 times by an enemy and you die

also keep away from the sides - instant death :(

up Arrow = jump 

right Arrow = forward

Fast mode Full screen

free android version: Here
